item.title: Disney and Universal Sue AI Company Midjourney for Copyright Infringement
item.description: In the complaint, the Hollywood giants allege Midjourney generates “endless” ripoffs of everything from minions to Darth Vader.

item.title: A Deep Learning Alternative Can Help AI Agents Gameplay the Real World
item.description: A new machine learning approach tries to better emulate the human brain, in hopes of creating more capable agentic AI.

item.title: 8 Best Cordless Vacuums for Your Whole House (2025)
